body.p: Ohio, twenty-sixth governor. Marietta, Ohio native. Attended Ohio University. Clerk of the Ohio State Senate from 1825 to 1837. Member of the Ohio House of Representatives from 1838 to 1839. Ohio state auditor from 1839 to 1845. Secured the Union gubernatorial nomination and was elected governor of Ohio in the 1863 general election. Served as governor of Ohio from 1863 to 1865.
